body.p:
Cincin Ohio Jany 26th,/62
Hon B Magoffin
Dear Governor

enclosed I send you a list of names handed me by the County Judge of Lawrence County. to transmit to you. They are recommended by him as suitable persons for Justices of the peace. to suply vacancy's occasioned by resignation We have two armies on sandy river hot work looked for shortly. may "Godd defend the right"

Your obt
svt
Jno M Rice

Lawrence Co
Appt. of Justices for sundry Districts
appd. Jany 30 1862
